scripts.postinstall: npm run installNpmDep && npm run installBower && npm run installBowerDep && npm run buildApp && npm run copyApp
scripts.installBowerDep: cd client && if [ -f node_modules/.bin/bower ]; then node_modules/.bin/bower install; else bower install; fi
scripts.copyApp: cp client/dist/index.html public/ember.html && mkdir -p public/assets && cp -r client/dist/assets/* public/assets/
